alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 23 at 5:38PM MDT until October 25 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Eastern Las Animas County, Bent County,Prowers County, and Baca Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 6 PM MDT this evening. For the Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
